text: aldhyn ykhasmwn fi ayat allah whjjh ldfeha min ghyr 'an yakun ladayhim hujat mqbwlt, kabur dhlk aljidal mqtana eind allah waeind aladhin amnu, kama khatam baldlal whajab ean alhudaa qulub hwla' almkhasmyn, yakhtim allah ealaa qalb kl mstkbr ean tawhid allah wtaeth, jabaar bikathrat zulmih wedwanh
